name: Adrift (RugbugRedfern)
description:
A low-poly survival game in the very early alpha stages. Will eventually include a plot, animals, enemies, and possible multiplayer.

In game, you can access a help menu by pressing [ESC] and then clicking "Help."

The web version will not be updated as much, but will not require a download.

You can play the web version at: http://aws-website-montgomery-2erb0.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/adrift.ht...
